channel.title: Annihilated Reality || True Economy Server || 24/7 || Webclient
channel.description:
Hello, Annihilated Reality is a economy based server, unlike a lot of 'new' servers out there you do not join and get drop party's at a certain amount of players, or receive items upon joining, you log in and get your starter and begin your journey! the server is not easy! drop rates are set to be a economy-based server so it will not be easy to obtain the good items that you would like to have!
[B]Staff positions are open! but need to be earned, they are NOT given out![/B]
[code] * Fixed Special attacks * * Fixed Switching lag * * Fixed Gem Crafting * * Fixed Teleports * * Added Auto-Donation page * * Fixed Vote4Reward * * Fixed Donator Teleports * * Added custom XP boost ranks * * Updated outdated client information * * Fixed Prayer Drains * * Added Special effects to Spirit Shields * * Added Completionist cape when all 99's * * Fixed Hunter, and Summoning * * Added Nex * * Fixed Ranged Weapons * * Fixed Some Item Slots * * Updated Client * * Made nex fight more intense for teaming * * Added in ring of wealth * [/code]
[URL=http://"http://annihilatedreality.net/webclient.php"]Click here for the Webclient![/URL] [URL=http://"http://annihilatedreality.net/forums/"]Click here for the forums!( being worked on)[/URL]
Server features
- Perfect Switching - Pking all around the server - More that 25 unique bosses - Advanced Pk point system - Automatic Double Xp weekends - Tons of different training areas - Duel arena - Staking - Fun Pk - Active Staff - Vote system fully functional ( runetoplistv2 ) - Summoning with all familiars - More than 1600 npc's spawned! - Ability to reset combat skills - Full pest control - Custom interfaces - Oldschool above-Ground barrows - fully working Nex - Almost all skills work! - Dupes are fixed ! - Clipped Following - 5 Custom items ( Death cape, Black partyhat, and Raptor Armour set ) - Slayer Point System - Vote Point System - Level Point System - Real dicing through clan-chat - Zombie Mini-game - Ring of Wealth - Many more features !
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2gsoqcm.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/htgvau.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2elgfsw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2ajq73c.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2zgbzma.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3447255/boss1.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3447256/boss2.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3447257/boss3.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/3447259/boss4.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3447261/barrows.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/28w2i4i.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/wgoojq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/33z7868.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/28jwoqq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/55ovt0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/34jbo9d.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2wlsll4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2luorxg.png[/img]
Client features
- Ability to choose between x10 and x1 hitmarks - Ability to choose between new hitmarks (with combat style icon) or old hitmarks - Ability to choose between game frames
Feel free to criticize my server, wont mind it and i hope to see some new faces on it so thanks for taking the time to view this :)
[URL=http://"http://annihilatedreality.net/webclient.php"]Click here for the Webclient![/URL] [URL=http://"http://annihilatedreality.net/forums/"]Click here for the forums!( being worked on)[/URL]

item.title: Annihilated Reality || True Economy Server || 24/7 || Webclient
item.dc:creator: @chiapet chiapet
item.description:
@chiapet wrote:

Hello, Annihilated Reality is a economy based server, unlike a lot of ‘new’ servers out there you do not join and get drop party’s at a certain amount of players, or receive items upon joining, you log in and get your starter and begin your journey! the server is not easy! drop rates are set to be a economy-based server so it will not be easy to obtain the good items that you would like to have!

Staff positions are open! but need to be earned, they are NOT given out!

* Fixed Special attacks *
* Fixed Switching lag *
* Fixed Gem Crafting *
* Fixed Teleports *
* Added Auto-Donation page *
* Fixed Vote4Reward *
* Fixed Donator Teleports *
* Added custom XP boost ranks *
* Updated outdated client information *
* Fixed Prayer Drains *
* Added Special effects to Spirit Shields *
* Added Completionist cape when all 99's * 
* Fixed Hunter, and Summoning * 
* Added Nex *
* Fixed Ranged Weapons *
* Fixed Some Item Slots *
* Updated Client *
* Made nex fight more intense for teaming *
* Added in ring of wealth *

Click here for the Webclient!
Click here for the forums!( being worked on)

Server features

  • Perfect Switching
  • Pking all around the server
  • More that 25 unique bosses
  • Advanced Pk point system
  • Automatic Double Xp weekends
  • Tons of different training areas
  • Duel arena - Staking
  • Fun Pk
  • Active Staff
  • Vote system fully functional ( runetoplistv2 )
  • Summoning with all familiars
  • More than 1600 npc’s spawned!
  • Ability to reset combat skills
  • Full pest control
  • Custom interfaces
  • Oldschool above-Ground barrows
  • fully working Nex
  • Almost all skills work!
  • Dupes are fixed !
  • Clipped Following
  • 5 Custom items ( Death cape, Black partyhat, and Raptor Armour set )
  • Slayer Point System
  • Vote Point System
  • Level Point System
  • Real dicing through clan-chat
  • Zombie Mini-game
  • Ring of Wealth
  • Many more features !


















Client features

  • Ability to choose between x10 and x1 hitmarks
  • Ability to choose between new hitmarks (with combat style icon) or old hitmarks
  • Ability to choose between game frames

Feel free to criticize my server, wont mind it and i hope to see some new faces on it so thanks for taking the time to view this

Click here for the Webclient!
Click here for the forums!( being worked on)
